channel.title: Question: How do you make shops in a 525?
channel.description:
[quote="ghostly150, post:1, topic:355318"]I found this 525 source and client I want to use but it didn't have any shops in it and I am fairly new to 525's. I was wondering if anyone could point me to a tutorial or something...? I've spent at least two days altogether searching (not 2 days straight but its just to show the point). So could anyone please help with this? It would help a LOT! :) ;)
Thank you, Ghostly150
Anyone? PLEASE!?!?!?!?[/quote]
Can [i]ANYONE[/i] please help me?!?!?!?!?

item.title: Question: How do you make shops in a 525?
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:

I was wondering if anyone could point me to a tutorial or something…? I’ve spent at least two days altogether searching (not 2 days straight but its just to show the point). So could anyone please help with this? It would help a LOT!

Thank you,
